https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gTDt04LtD1IUn8FWamBbKUBOQXq.jpg On a trip to Big Sur, two friends, both actresses, try to reconnect with one another. Once alone, the women's suppressed jealousies and deep-seated resentments begin to rise, causing them to lose their grasp on not only the true nature of their relationship, but also their identities. Always Shine
